config.title: Enable Language Server
config.description: Use the `gopls` language server for enhanced functionality. The `gopls` command should be installed in your search path, or you can specify the full path below.

config.title: Language Server Command
config.description: The command name to start the `gopls` language server. Use an absolute path here if `gopls` is not in your search path ($PATH environment variable).

config.title: (Experimental) Format/Organize Imports when saving file (DANGEROUS!)
config.description:
When saving, use `gopls` to format file according to Go formatting standards and organize imports (the equivalent of executing `gofmt`, `goimports`, `goreturns`). Requires `gopls` language server to be active.
WARNING: For experimental purposes ONLY! Currently it WILL DESTROY YOUR FILES!

config.title: (Experimental) Use https://staticcheck.io for further analysis
config.description: Use `gopls` in conjunction with https://staticcheck.io for further analysis of the code. This also requires `gopls` language server to be active.
